00031 Grid::Grid()
00032 {
00033     width = 0;
00034     height = 0;
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00039 
00043 Grid::Grid(int w, int h)
00044 {
00045     width = w;
00046     height = h;
00047     //Main vector
00048     cells.resize(w);
00049     //Vector's vector resizes
00050     for (int i = 0; i < w; i++)
00051     {
00052         cells[i].resize(h);
00053     }
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00058 
00061 Grid::Grid(matrix newList)
00062 {
00063     width = newList.size();
00064     height = newList[0].size();
00065     cells = newList;    
00066 }

00080 void Grid::init(const Grid& grid)
00081 {
00082     width = grid.getWidth();
00083     height = grid.getHeight();
00084     cells = grid.getCells();
00085 }

00115 bool Grid::isEnabled(int x, int y)
00116 {
00117     return cells[x][y] == nENABLED;
00118 }
00119

00128 bool Grid::isDisabled(int x, int y)
00129 {
00130     return cells[x][y] == nDISABLED;

00154 bool Grid::isOutput(int x, int y)

00167 bool Grid::isSpace(int x, int y)

00192 int& Grid::operator()(int x, int y)
00193 {
00194     return cells[x][y];
00195 }

00199 
00205 bool Grid::operator ==(Grid grid)
00206 {
00207     if (grid.getWidth() != getWidth())
00208     {
00209         return false;
00210     }
00211     else if (grid.getHeight() != getHeight())
00212     {
00213         return false;
00214     }
00215     else
00216     {
00217         for (int i = 0; i < getWidth(); i++)
00218         {
00219             for (int j = 0; j < getHeight(); j++)
00220             {
00221                 if (cells[i][j] != grid(i, j))
00222                 {
00223                     return false;
00224                 }
00225             }
00226         }
00227     }
00228     return true;
00229 }
